project.name: dataexp
project.description: An application for exploring and visualizing the timeseries

Connectors.name: Connectors
Connectors.description: Connectors to different types of storages.

FileConnector.name: FileConnector
FileConnector.description: A connector to the files (JSON and CSV)

MongoConnector.name: MongoConnector
MongoConnector.description: A connector to the MongoDB database

MysqlConnector.name: MysqlConnector
MysqlConnector.description: A connector to the MySQL database

routes.name: routes
routes.description:
A class (module) that defines all the API URLs, and the related methods.
Here are some of the URLs:
- /api/sources: GET a JSON with sources configuration - /api/sources: POST a new source, returns an empty array - /api/sources/:source_name: DELETE source, returns an empty array - /api/stores: POST a sources config, returns an array of stores - /api/fields: POST a stores config, returns an array of fields - /api/timeseries: POST a fields config, returns the realted dataset - /api/stats: GET statistics from tsproc - /api/config: GET configuration JSON of tsproc

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the 
name of the store (single one because it's
a file) that are present in the specified by
config file database.
classitems.name: getStoreNames

return.description: An array of stores (file) configuration

classitems.description: A public method that adds a field 'size' to the store (file) configuration specified in store_config.
classitems.name: getStoreSize

return.description:
An array of stores (file) configuration with
additional 'size' field

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the field names present in each document.
Fields are only checked in the first document of store (file).
Also the value of each field is saved (cf exemple).
classitems.name: getFields

return.description: An array of fields configuration

classitems.description: A public method that takes in the fields configuration file (dataset_config) and returns the requested dataset.
classitems.name: getDataset

return.description: A requested dataset

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of source (file)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidSourceConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store (file)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidStoreConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store dataset
configuration
classitems.name: isValidDatasetConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the 
names of the stores (mongo collections)
that are present in the specified by
config file database.
classitems.name: getStoreNames

return.description: An array of stores (mongo collections) configuration

classitems.description: A public method that adds a field 'size' to the store (mongo collection) configuration specified in store_config.
classitems.name: getStoreSize

return.description:
An array of stores (mongo collections) configuration with
additional 'size' field

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the field names present in each document.
Fields are only checked in the first document of store (mongo collection).
Also the value of each field is saved (cf exemple).
The mongodb '_id' field is ommited.
classitems.name: getFields

return.description: An array of fields configuration

classitems.description: A public method that takes in the fields configuration file (dataset_config) and returns the requested dataset.
classitems.name: getDataset

return.description: A requested dataset

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of source (mongo database)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidSourceConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store (mongo collection)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidStoreConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store dataset
configuration
classitems.name: isValidDatasetConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the 
names of the stores (mysql tables)
that are present in the specified by
config file database.
classitems.name: getStoreNames

return.description: An array of stores (mysql tables) configuration

classitems.description: A public method that adds a field 'size' to the store (mysql table) configuration specified in store_config.
classitems.name: getStoreSize

return.description:
An array of stores (mysql tables) configuration with
additional 'size' field

classitems.description:
A public method that returns the column names of the table.
Also the first value of each column is saved (cf exemple).
classitems.name: getFields

return.description: An array of fields configuration

classitems.description: A public method that takes in the fields configuration file (dataset_config) and returns the requested dataset.
classitems.name: getDataset

return.description: A requested dataset

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of source (mysql database)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidSourceConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store (mysql table)
configuration
classitems.name: isValidStoreConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A private method that checks
the validity of store dataset
configuration
classitems.name: isValidDatasetConfig

return.description: true if config is valid, false if not

classitems.description:
A method that removes a source configuration from the ./server/config/sources.json file. The source to delete is specified by it's name in the req object.
If the source to delete is a file (JSON or CSV), then it would be deleted from the directory ./server/datasets/.
An empty array is returned by the res object.
classitems.name: deleteSource

classitems.description: A method that returns (via the object res) the fields configuration of the requested (via the object req) stores.
classitems.name: getFields

classitems.description:
A method that returns (via the object res) a JSON file with configuration of sources (ex: MySQL database).
The configuration on the server is stored in the file ./server/config/sources.json.
classitems.name: getSources

classitems.description: A method that returns (via the object res) the stores configuration of the requested (via the object req) sources.
classitems.name: getStores

classitems.description:
A method that returns (via the object res) the full timeseries with all requested (via the object req) fields. The tsproc configuration is also passed by req object.
The method passes all the timeseries through the tsproc module.
classitems.name: getTimeseries

classitems.description: A method that returns (via the object res) the stats that were pulled from tsproc module during the call of the getTimeseries() method.
classitems.name: getStats

classitems.description:
A method that returns (via the object res) the configuration file that were pulled from tsproc module during the call of the getTimeseries() method.
The config is pulled from tsproc before it starts to process data, which can modify the config. the getConfig() method to return
classitems.name: getConfig

classitems.description:
A method that receives an array of size 3 (from front-end) that contains: - 0: tsproc module options - 1: array of timestamp fields configuration - 2: array of other fields configuration
Then it pulls from it the two arays, and returns a single configuration which has all the fields regrouped by store (cf example)
The method is used to prepare a configuration file for the tsproc.
classitems.name: regroupFields

params.name: configs
params.description: An array of configurations for tsproc module

classitems.description:
A method that adds a new source configuration to the ./server/config/sources.json file. The source to add is passed via the req object.
If the new source is a file (JSON or CSV), then it would be saved as a json to the directory ./server/datasets/.
An empty array is returned by the res object.
classitems.name: putSource
